/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by buildings and trees, creating a canopy of greenery over the urban landscape. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. A large construction site in the background hints at the city's continuous growth and development. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of scale to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, reflecting the lively atmosphere of the city.
